SELECT TMU.USER_SEQ, TMU.USER_ID, TMU.USER_NM, TMU.USER_NM_EN, TMU.USER_EMAIL, TMURM.ROLE_ID, TMR.ROLE_NM
FROM TB_META_USER TMU
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_META_USER_ROLE_MAPPING TMURM ON TMU.USER_SEQ = TMURM.USER_SEQ
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_META_ROLE TMR ON TMURM.ROLE_ID = TMR.ROLE_ID
WHERE TMU.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT TMMRM.MENU_ID, TMM.MENU_NM, TMM.MENU_NM_EN, TMM.MENU_URL FROM TB_META_MENU_ROLE_MAPPING TMMRM
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_META_MENU TMM ON TMMRM.MENU_ID = TMM.MENU_ID
WHERE ROLE_ID = (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM TB_META_USER_ROLE_MAPPING WHERE USER_SEQ = #{USER_SEQ})
AND TMM.PAR_MENU_ID IS NULL
ORDER BY MENU_ORDR ASC

SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_NM_EN, MENU_URL, MENU_ORDR FROM TB_META_MENU WHERE PAR_MENU_ID = #{PAR_MENU_ID} AND MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM TB_META_MENU_ROLE_MAPPING WHERE ROLE_ID = (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM TB_META_USER_ROLE_MAPPING WHERE USER_SEQ = #{USER_SEQ}) )
ORDER BY MENU_ORDR ASC
